title: How Healthy Soils Build a Strong Food Brand

tasks.task: Explain the importance of complex soil and nutrients for plant and human health.
subtasks: Discuss the need for a complex gut biome in people.
Compare the roots of plants seeking complex micronutrients to humans.
Contrast conventional farming's industrial imitation soil with healthy living soil.
Criticize conventional farming's reliance on synthesized fertilizers.
Explain the consequences of growing plants in nutrient-poor soil.
Link imitation soil to imitation plants and food.
Relate the effects of imitation food to health problems.
